price: 45. (Moisés y Aarón) dijeron: “¡Señor nuestro!, tememos que se precipite a castigarnos o que se exceda (con nosotros)”.
arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفۡرُطَ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوۡ أَن يَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālā rabbanā innanā nakhāfu an yafruṭa ʿalaynā aw an yaṭghā
